title: My ping has exactly doubled since the 6.17 patch
body:
exactly from 40s and 50s to 80s and 100s. its ridiculous. my internet is fucking fine.

every single game. every single game

Porocles don't come and tell me the stupid go online the troubleshooting tool bullshit.   or some " your client has issues connecting to some random network" crap. a lot of player have the exact same problem. it happens nearly every patch. its not our damn fault. its you.

replies.body: Same here i would usually get 40 and now im getting 87 to 90 in LAN, im getting lower ping in NA then in LAN and i live in puerto rico how does that make sence i want my 40ping back i transfered my NA account to LAN for a reason and now that reason is gone cuz im getting worse ping in LAN which is pissing me off.

Your internet might be fine, but it doesn't mean that your connection or ISP's routing to our server specifically is okay.  It could be a packet loss issue or some other reason entirely.  I simply don't know what that could be for you without more information.  

I know this is a crappy situation, and I'd like to help but I can't work with too much without [troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  Even just running a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)could get more information of your routing, and an idea of what's going on.  The reason we need this is to rule out possibilities and analyse the situation.  The choice of course is yours!

Its not just him. Its a problem on YOUR GUY'S end. im in a group on FB and quite a few of them notice a ping increase. I called my ISP and everything. They said everything is fine nothing is happening or showing any issues. but when i connect to a league game, my ping usually was 23 now its 54. Every other game is fine. It's just your game.
